definitions.title: n.m.pl.
definitions.body: musical instr. of percussion, cymbals (with clashing sound; NH [[חֶלְחַל]], Aram. [[חֶלְחְלִין]], s.iys.lo0) ;—´[[ח]] 2Sa 6:5 (+ [[מְנַעַנְעִים]], q. v.; ‖ 1Ch 13:8 [[מְחִלְתַּיִם]]); cstr. [[חִלְחְלֵי־שָָׁמַע]] Ps 150:5, [[תְּרוּעָה]] v:Ps 150:5; —cf. Now:Arch. i. 272 f. 272 f. Benz:Arch. 277 We:Psalm Psalm Eng. Tr. 232.
